Articles.Content:
I used to use mechjeb for almost everything.

Now i only use it for the information readouts, calculating launch windows, initial approach for docking and launching refueling tanks to the station.

I like to fly my designs as they would be in real life.They would never let a Kerbal fly that thing manually ... EVER! :DD

MJ all the way baby

No.

Installed it once. Played around with it, and uninstalled within the hour.

I prefer do play the game myself even down to the routine, repetitive launches.
